fileTypes: Separate URLs, filetypes, sortableList and downloadIfKeywords with a semicolon if you have multiple options of the mentioned columns
sortableList can be empty if you don't want to construct the filename. Just leave empty or just supply "filename". Both cases default to the filename
If buildCheckbox is FALSE then you don't need a value in the sortableList column
Required columns are in bold. If you specify an option in the sortableList then buildCheckbox column must be TRUE
You can only specify a sequence in the sequence column f you have specified the sequence option in the sortableList column
You can only use either "and" OR "or" in the downloadLogic column if you have both the contains and not-contains options
You cannot specify the "all" option in the filetype and still have other filetypes. It's either "all" OR any individual filetypes or a combination of any of the individual filetypes
If you plan to use the Queue Download option then you don't have to worry about the downloadTime column because that option disables scheduling and enables queued downloads
G11 contains a combination of the filename construction which you can imitate
